attributes.action: Ban the islamic state flag in the UK
attributes.background: I believe that the islamic state flag is avdvertising the terrorist group and should be banned in the UK

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it is already a criminal offence to carry or display articles in public in such a way as arouse reasonable suspicion that an individual is a supporter of an organisation such as ISIS.

You can find out more here:

https://assets.publishing.service.gov.uk/government/uploads/system/uploads/attachment_data/file/783067/proscribed-terrorist-organisations.pdf

We therefore unsure what further action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take.
